BIO

2019 marks my 40th year in Tech and IT. Over that period I've worked for some very large companies and also worked self employed in the UK and here in Spain, where I've lived for 16 years.

My experience over this period has been in both hardware and software which I believe gives me an excellent overall view of the Tech world.

Over this time I've repaired and upgraded hundreds of Laptops, PCs & Phones. I've upgraded hardware and software and also advised many that their "device" is no longer sensible to "keep throwing money at" to keep it going. This, I believe, is the proper way to do business.
